artifacts.summary: Implementation summary documenting forward-only truth lemma refactoring and build fixes

completion_data.completion_summary: Refactored completeness proofs to use forward-only Truth Lemma by rewriting completeness_contrapositive to avoid backward direction. Fixed build infrastructure issues that were blocking the Representation module (SoundnessLemmas axiom cases, reflexive semantics type mismatches, missing lemmas in MCSProperties). Build passes with 707 jobs.
